trans-unit.source: Provides a container for all the properties attached to an instance of a validation error that occurred during the design time or run time of a workflow activity.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个容器，用于包含与某个验证错误的实例相关的所有属性，而此验证错误是在工作流活动的设计时或运行时发生的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationErrorInfo" /> class.
An exception that occurs during the validation of a workflow activity.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流活动验证期间发生的异常。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationErrorInfo" /> class with the specified validation error.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的验证错误创建 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationErrorInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An alphanumeric message that provides additional information about the error.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关错误的附加信息的字母数字型消息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationErrorInfo" /> class that contains information about a specific error.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationErrorInfo" /> 类的新实例，该实例包含特定错误的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alphanumeric name of the file that generated the error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成错误的文件的字母数字型名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that generated the error.
trans-unit.target: 生成该错误的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此错误的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the constraint violation is a warning.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定违反约束的情况是否为警告。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the constraint violation is a warning; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果违反约束的情况是一个警告，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an alphanumeric message that provides additional information about the error.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取一条提供有关错误的附加信息的字母数字型消息。

trans-unit.source: A text string comment that provides extra information.
trans-unit.target: 可提供附加信息的文本字符串注释。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alphanumeric name of the property that generated the error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成错误的属性的字母数字型名称。

trans-unit.source: A text string name of a property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的文本字符串名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the globally-unique identifier (GUID) of the source reference that generated the error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成此错误的源引用的全局限定标识符 (GUID)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> identifier of the source reference that generated the error.
trans-unit.target: 生成错误源引用的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 标识符。
